entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers or drizzle. Low 16. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers or drizzle overnight. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind becoming south 20 km/h near midnight. Low 16. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Saturday 10 September 2016

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers or drizzle. High 21. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers or drizzle in the morning. Rain beginning in the afternoon. Risk of thundershowers late in the afternoon. Fog patches. Amount 5 mm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 40 gusting to 60 early in the afternoon. High 21. Humidex 26. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Saturday 10 September 2016

entry.title: Sunday night: Rain. Low 9.
entry.summary: Rain ending in the evening then clearing. Risk of thundershowers early in the evening. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming west 20 in the evening. Low 9. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Saturday 10 September 2016
